title.narrative: Niger United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Niger Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Child Protection)
Niger Country Programme Document 2014-2018 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The human resources mobilized within the framework of the new country programme enabled to achieve the reported results. Clear guidance and technical support were provided to the implementing partners including the government counterparts from the various sectors and the NGOs during the planning and the implementation of the RWP. The section took the lead on the implementation of the KRC and on child marriage and to the development of programme document within the framework of the Spotlight initiative. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/01/2020
